document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">dare </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">leave </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">friend, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Because </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">because </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">die </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">While </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">gone </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">too </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">late </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">reach </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffe05e">wanted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">disappoint </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">eyes </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">hunted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">hunted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">see </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">could </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">bear </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">shut </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">until </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">"noticed" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">noticed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">stab </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">patient </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">faith </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">So </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">sure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'd </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">sure </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'd </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">come </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">It </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">listening </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#540c8c">listening </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">went </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">sleep </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Telling </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">tardy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">name </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff607c">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">would </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">wish </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">broke </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">before </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Since </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">breaking </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">since </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">breaking </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Were </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">useless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">next </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">morning's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d06ccc">sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Where </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c89430">midnight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">frosts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">lain! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I should not dare to leave my friend
